main event: A witness observed six unidentified flying objects in the sky while taking pictures in San Bernardino, California on July 7, 1956.
interesting points: The objects appeared metallic in color and made no sound., The observer attempted to take photographs, but the objects were moving rapidly., Analysis of a negative showed the object was significantly larger than the other objects in the area., The objects were first seen approximately 500 yards away., The sighting lasted for about 15 minutes before the objects disappeared.
sighted object: six metallic objects in the sky
witness description: W. L. George, an aircraft engine mechanic
